name: Edit LLC
description:
Edit LLC is the company that makes software that begins with people.
We’re the custom programming hub for web applications, website development, cloud software, and desktop applications.
Whether you are looking for SaaS applications (software as a service) for delivery over the Internet to end-users or PaaS applications (platform as a service) for coding and executing applications, it’s in our wheelhouse to provide the team that can make it happen for you.
